H0.text: what disease did bernie mac die of. Sarcoidosis

H1.text: what disease did bernie mac die of. Heart Failure

H2.text: what disease did bernie mac die of. Diabetes

H3.text: what disease did bernie mac die of. Pneumonia

A4.text: Mac died at 50 years old on August 9, 2008 in Chicago, Illinois from complications of pneumonia.

A5.text: However, the complications were not attributed to his sarcoidosis, according to his publicist.
